From: Unwired Planet IANA Registrar <iana-registrar&uplanet.com>

Sender: iana-registrar&uplanet.com
Subject: Request for MIME media type Application/Vendor Tree - vnd.
X-Real-Host-From: host-165-96.uplanet.com
Content-Length: 1702
X-Lines: 70
Status: RO

Name : Unwired Planet IANA Registrar

E-mail : iana-registrar&uplanet.com

MIME media type name : Application

MIME subtype name : Vendor Tree - vnd.uplanet.alert

Required parameters : None.

Optional parameters : 
charset: defines the charset used in the content. Since this content
type is an XML application, this parameter conforms to the same
guidelines as the XML Mediatypes described in RFC 2376.

level: represents the version of the content type used (the current
level is 1.0). New levels of this type will cause this registration to
be updated from time to time.


Encoding considerations : 
This content type is an XML application.

This content is 8 bit text and, as such, may require encoding on 7bit
transport when 8bit characters are present.


Security considerations : 
- This type contains no executable code

- This type may contain information which, if not encrypted, could violate
  user's privacy.

- Processing of instances of this type accepted over an unsecured connection 
  can cause minor corruption to the client's state.


Interoperability considerations : 
None.

Published specification : 
Not available at this time

Applications which use this media : 
UP.Link Platform 4.0
UP.browser 4.0


Additional information :

1. Magic number(s) : N/A
2. File extension(s) : N/A
3. Macintosh file type code : N/A
This is a re-submission:
Based on prior communication and the corrections made in this
submission, we now believe that this submission is in an acceptable
state.

Person to contact for further information :

1. Name : Unwired Planet IANA Registrar
2. E-mail : iana-registrar&uplanet.com

Intended usage : Common 


Author/Change controller : Thierry Paradan
